dcterms:creator: M. Carpita
A. Dassatti
M. Bozorg
J. Jaton
S. Reynaud
O. A. Mousavi
dcterms:description: Grid monitoring devices provide synchronized, near real-time, and accurate data on voltages, line currents, active and reactive power flows for flexibility provision and activation.
dcterms:title: GridEye monitoring devices

dcterms:creator: I. Staffell
S. Pfenninger
dcterms:description: The dataset provides solar irradiance and power output profiles for solar PVs, which are used for flexibility estimation in the context of distributed energy resources.
dcterms:title: Solar PVs and EV charging stations

dcterms:creator: M. Heleno
R. Soares
J. Sumaili
R. J. Bessa
L. Seca
M. A. Matos
dcterms:description: This dataset estimates the flexibility range in the transmission-distribution boundary, which is crucial for understanding the flexibility potential of distributed energy resources.
dcterms:title: Flexibility potential of DERs

dcterms:creator: A. Majumdar
O. Alizadeh-Mousavi
dcterms:description: This dataset provides flexibility estimation from low voltage grids using monitoring and control equipment, which is essential for optimal grid operation.
dcterms:title: Flexibility estimation from Low Voltage Grids
